title: नानावटी अस्पताल ने नींबू, हल्दी को Covid-19 का उपचार नहीं बताया, फ़र्ज़ी मेसेज वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: While Vitamin C and others help boost immunity against any infection or illness, these are not recommended treatments by our doctors for Corona Virus patients. Please follow any treatment protocols only after consulting your doctor.
